front.title: MPLS-TP Traffic Engineering (TE) Management Information Base (MIB)

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes managed objects of Tunnels, Identifiers, Label Switch Router and Textual conventions for Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) based Transport Profile (TP).
